channel.title: Is moparisthebest being attacked?
channel.description:
is moparisthebest being attacked by jagex or something who are trying to shut it down? also why did it get moved to moparisthebest.(org) :confused:
oh and sorry if this has already been posted before :o

item.title: Is moparisthebest being attacked?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Search around a few threads next time

He’s being attacked by RaW because RaW wants to attempt another scam with AR2. He’s been attacking Scythe, IMPsoft and Mopar, because they are the people who can stop him scamming.

Impsoft have been down for about a week now, Not sure about Scythe, and Mopar can’t go down at the moment

Read full topic
